quest.name: Setting Things Straight
journal: Urianger is quite glad for your company.
objectives: Stand watch at the designated location and defeat any enemies that appear.
Stand watch at the designated location.
Search for Runningway at the designated location.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: I thank thee for accompanying me.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: 'Tis a simple plan, in truth. We shall not be long away from Bestways Burrow.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Difficult decisions must needs be made in the coming days, but I nevertheless believe we are all of one mind in our desire to save the people of Etheirys.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: To make clear our resolve to the Loporrits, I would offer them a gift. But its making doth require a most singular ingredient.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Ah, an abundance of spongoi. Excellent.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: I chanced to spy this aggregation when crossing Zodiark's erstwhile prison.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Using a spell taught to me by the Nu Mou, I believe these shall suffice for the gift I would fashion.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: The magick requireth considerable concentration, however. Might I prevail upon thee to stand watch whilst I perform the incantation?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Urianger is wholly absorbed in weaving his enchantment. Until his work is complete, he will need to be kept safe from harm...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Surveying the nearby area, you see no sign of potential threats. This would be a good opportunity to see how Urianger is faring...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Urianger remains fixated on his work...

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: There... 'Tis done.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: A magicked ink, every onze as efficacious as that crafted by the Nu Mou.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Rare is the occasion I would conjure mine own, but is nevertheless a most useful skill.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: The resulting product is, admittedly, possessed of no preternatural properties, but its hue is one of mine own choosing, which I pray the Loporrits will appreciate.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: (-???-)Forename! Urianger! Oh, thank goodness. I thought you had been eaten, or had perhaps fallen into a crater.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Y'shtola has been looking all over for you, Forename. She says she needs to speak with you about something most urgent. Dire, even.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: She was also quite clear that she wishes to speak with Forename alone. Which means, I'm afraid, you must stay behind, Urianger.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: But worry not! It just so happens we need your help with an errand─delivering a package from the Watcher's Palace to Bestways Burrow. It's quite large and heavy─perhaps even too heavy, for we poor Loporrits─and we would be ever so grateful if you could lend us a hand.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Well, I suppose I should be going, then...

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: How about an extra pair of hands before I go and meet with Y'shtola?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: That's convenient... Suspiciously convenient.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Phew, good...

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: I-I mean, yes, very good. Let us not keep you, then. She said she would be waiting for you in Greatest Endsvale...or somewhere thereabouts. I'm sure you'll find her soon enough.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: No, no, that won't be necessary. Urianger's help should more than suffice.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: And I'm sure you don't want to risk getting on Y'shtola's bad side by keeping her waiting. She seems...prickly. Now, off with you.

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: Are you insinuating I would betray the trust of Hydaelyn's chosen? Or worse─do anything to risk getting on Y'shtola's bad side!?

dialogue.name: LIVINGWAY
dialogue.text: She's clearly not one to be crossed, nor made to wait. Now, off with you!

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Worry not, Forename. I shan't be long.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Everything is all right with Urianger, then? That's a relief.

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh! B-Back so soon?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Oh, Forename. We thought you would be away for far longer.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: A dire emergency? I said no such thing.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: But as you are here, I could use your assistance with one small matter.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Runningway, a companion of Growingway's, apparently has much to tell us of the Final Days.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: The problem, however, is that he is determined to live up to his name, refusing to stay still long enough for us to hold a conversation.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Is there anywhere he's likely to stop and rest? Or perhaps there's a way to slow him down?

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: Wh-What's the rush? I was thinking we should wait here, maybe enjoy a cold mug of carrot juice, and...no? <sigh> Well, if it's really that important...

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: You can try using these...balls. Of mousse flesh. Not to be confused with...the other thing.

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ahem. Runningway's other notable feature is his incessant chatter, so you'll have no trouble finding him in a crowd. And when you do, try lobbing your balls at him.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Crude, but if it proves effective... He was here in Greatest Endsvale when last I saw him. Let us split up and find him.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Search your surroundings for Runningway. You may move the camera, as well as zoom in and out. Target Runningway and throw mousse balls with [???]/[???].

dialogue.name: RUNNINGWAY
dialogue.text: Hm? Yes, I'm Runningway. Do you mind explaining why you hit me in the face with your balls... Of mousse flesh?

dialogue.name: RUNNINGWAY
dialogue.text: I'm highly knowledgeable about the Final Days?

dialogue.name: RUNNINGWAY
dialogue.text: Hah, that's the most ridiculous thing I've heard since I woke up! Who told you that joke?

dialogue.name: RUNNINGWAY
dialogue.text: As if we've got time to look into the Final Days when there's so much to do before the great voyage.

dialogue.name: RUNNINGWAY
dialogue.text: It's true that Hydaelyn did impart to us some knowledge of the event, but I know about as much as any other Loporrit around here. Less, probably.

dialogue.name: RUNNINGWAY
dialogue.text: I don't know why anyone would think it's funny to go around telling people I'm an expert, but they'd better hope I don't get my paws on them!

dialogue.name: RUNNINGWAY
dialogue.text: Sorry I couldn't be of more help, but if there's nothing else, I've work to do!

dialogue.name: RUNNINGWAY
dialogue.text: And I'm off!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Any luck? I tried near the entrance, but there was no sign of him.

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oh no, you caught him? I-I mean... Well done you...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I could find neither hide nor...hair of him. How did you fare?

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: So, he knows no more than the others.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Care to explain yourself, Growingway?

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: W-Well, you see... I, uh...

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: I misremembered. Yes, that's it! I misremembered. Terribly sorry about that.

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: Hmmm. Afraid I'm drawing a blank, though. Try as I might, I can't remember who I was thinking of.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: On an unrelated note, what of Urianger? I assume you spoke with him earlier, but did he say when he'll be returning?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: On his way to the Watcher's Palace with Livingway?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Between Growingway's sudden lapse of memory and our lack of other leads, maybe our time would be better spent lending Urianger a hand.

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: Wh-What!? Now hold on a moment!

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: It's all coming back to me. Yes, I remember!

dialogue.name: GROWINGWAY
dialogue.text: The information you're looking for is in the archives. Yes, that's where you'll find all sorts of useful knowledge, including that pertaining to the Final Days.
